subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Baseball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. is accusing Arizona State of a “lack of institutional control” of the baseball program, citing allegations that include impermissible recruiting phone calls and a failure to monitor baseball staff members.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. is accusing Arizona State of a “lack of institutional control” of the baseball program, citing allegations that include impermissible recruiting phone calls and a failure to monitor baseball staff members.
